// Problem Code : Clean the Forum Posts
// Problem URL : http://www.codechef.com/problems/CLNFORUM
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <fstream>
#include <sstream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d%*c",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		string line;
		getline(cin, line);
		stringstream ss(line);
		string ans = "";
		string samp;
		while(ss >> samp)
		{
			if(samp == "8")ans += "ate ";
			else if(samp == "w8")ans += "wait ";
			else if(samp == "gr8")ans += "great ";
			else if(samp == "4")ans += "for ";
			else if(samp == "b4")ans += "before ";
			else ans += samp + " ";
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
